children.name: lookingForClock
children.text: I'm trying to find a missing clock. Can you help?
children.response: Possbily. But as luck would have it, I'm in need of some help myself.

children.name: whatDoYouNeed
children.response: We're getting ready for ComicCon. I'm going as Princess Leia. But I've misplaced my ticket! I have to find it soon, can you help?

children.name: acceptQuest
children.response: Oh, thank you! I know it's around here somewhere.

children.name: rejectQuest
children.text: I would love to, but I just don't have time.
children.response: You sure about that? You never know when some little side quest actually turns out to be in the critical path of the main quest.

children.name: noTime
children.text: (*sigh*) I'm sorry, I don't have time for this.
children.response: Fair enough. Should you ever change your mind, though...

children.name: notSure
children.response: Well, if you haven't been to the village below, just west of here, I suggest you start there. That is, if you're looking for adventure.

entries.name: hanaCompleted
entries.text: I can't thank you enough for your help. I'm really looking forward to the trip. Even if two of us are dressed identically.

children.name: nextClues
children.response: Sorry. But if you haven't already, go talk to Igor. He knows things.
